name: PO detail
query:
SELECT
    po.name AS "PO ID:Link/Purchase Order:150",
    po.po_number AS "PO Number:Data:130",
    po.workflow_state AS "WF State:Data:100",
    po.po_status AS "PO Status:Data:100",
    po.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:100",
    po.po_placed AS "PO Placed:Date:100",
    
    -- Buyer 顯示 Partner 名稱
    IFNULL(buyer_partner.partner_name, po.buyer) AS "Buyer:Data:170",
    
    -- Supplier 顯示 Partner 名稱（重點！）
    IFNULL(supplier_partner.partner_name, po.supplier) AS "Supplier:Data:190",
    
    po.purpose AS "Purpose:Data:150",
    po.origin_country AS "Origin Country:Link/Country:120",
    po.origin_port AS "Origin Port:Data:110",
    po.destination_port AS "Destination Port:Data:120",
    
    -- Coordinator 顯示 User 真名
    IFNULL(coord_user.full_name, coord_user.name) AS "Coordinator:Data:130",
    
    po.po_shipdate AS "PO ShipDate:Date:110",
    po.requested_dc_eta AS "Finish Date:Date:120",
    po.booking_status AS "Booking Status:Data:110",
    po.creation AS "Created On:Datetime:130",
    po.modified AS "Last Updated:Datetime:130"

FROM
    `tabPurchase Order` po
    LEFT JOIN `tabPartner` buyer_partner    ON po.buyer = buyer_partner.name
    LEFT JOIN `tabPartner` supplier_partner ON po.supplier = supplier_partner.name
    LEFT JOIN `tabUser`    coord_user       ON po.coordinator = coord_user.name
WHERE
    po.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    po.po_shipdate DESC, po.creation DESC
